name: Ghenstab
description:
Ghenstab is an awesome platformer game where you need to jump over enemies to kill them.

News in the 0.2.2 update :

- now there are coins to collect

- new scoring system

- new sounds

- slight main menu redesign

- new font

Bug fixes in the 0.2.2 update :

- When you somehow touched two collision boxes from an enemy, then the game would teleport you about 20px in the work the way the enemy was facing

- Main menu bug : when you exited the character selector it would almost immediately spawn you into the world
